name: Pulsar
description: The Apache Pulsar connector allows you to access the Apache Pulsar Producer API through WSO2 MI. Hence, Apache Pulsar connector acts as a message producer which facilitates publishing messages from WSO2 MI to Apache Pulsar topics.

operations.name: init
operations.description: Configure the Apache Pulsar Client Connection

operations.name: publishMessage
operations.description: Publish message to the Apache Pulsar cluster

connections.name: pulsar
connections.description: Connection for a Apache Pulsar cluster.

connections.name: pulsarsecure
connections.description: Secure Connection for a Apache Pulsar cluster.
